properties.description: Detects failed multi-factor authentication attempts. This might indicate credential stuffing or brute-force attacks.
properties.name: Invalid Code for Multi-Factor Authentication Entered
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 40205
| extend SID = extract("SID=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Endpoint = extract("Endpoint=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Endpoint"] = Endpoint,
    ["User SID"] = SID,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
